verses.verse: In the tenth <WH6224> year, <WH8141> in the tenth <WH6224> month, in the twelfth <WH8147> <WH6240> day of the month, <WH2320> the word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068> came <WH1961> unto <WH413> me, saying, <WH559>

Son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> set <WH7760> thy face <WH6440> against <WH5921> Pharaoh <WH6547> king <WH4428> of Egypt, <WH4714> and prophesy <WH5012> against <WH5921> him, and against <WH5921> all <WH3605> Egypt: <WH4714>

Speak, <WH1696> and say, <WH559> Thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> Behold, <WH2009> I am against <WH5921> thee, Pharaoh <WH6547> king <WH4428> of Egypt, <WH4714> the great <WH1419> dragon <WH8577> that lieth <WH7257> in the midst <WH8432> of his rivers, <WH2975> which <WH834> hath said, <WH559> My river <WH2975> is mine own, and I <WH589> have made <WH6213> it for myself.

But I will put <WH5414> hooks <WH2397> in thy jaws, <WH3895> and I will cause the fish <WH1710> of thy rivers <WH2975> to stick <WH1692> unto thy scales, <WH7193> and I will bring thee up <WH5927> out of the midst <WH4480> <WH8432> of thy rivers, <WH2975> and all <WH3605> the fish <WH1710> of thy rivers <WH2975> shall stick <WH1692> unto thy scales. <WH7193>

And I will leave <WH5203> thee thrown into the wilderness, <WH4057> thee and all <WH3605> the fish <WH1710> of thy rivers: <WH2975> thou shalt fall <WH5307> upon <WH5921> the open <WH6440> fields; <WH7704> thou shalt not <WH3808> be brought together, <WH622> nor <WH3808> gathered: <WH6908> I have given <WH5414> thee for meat <WH402> to the beasts <WH2416> of the field <WH776> and to the fowls <WH5775> of the heaven. <WH8064>

And all <WH3605> the inhabitants <WH3427> of Egypt <WH4714> shall know <WH3045> that <WH3588> I <WH589> am the LORD, <WH3068> because <WH3282> they have been <WH1961> a staff <WH4938> of reed <WH7070> to the house <WH1004> of Israel. <WH3478>

When they took hold <WH8610> of thee by thy hand, <WH3709> thou didst break, <WH7533> and rend <WH1234> all <WH3605> their shoulder: <WH3802> and when they leaned <WH8172> upon <WH5921> thee, thou didst broke, <WH7665> and madest all <WH3605> their loins <WH4975> to be at a stand. <WH5976>

Therefore <WH3651> thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> Behold, <WH2009> I will bring <WH935> a sword <WH2719> upon <WH5921> thee, and cut off <WH3772> man <WH120> and beast <WH929> out of <WH4480> thee.

And the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> shall be <WH1961> desolate <WH8077> and waste; <WH2723> and they shall know <WH3045> that <WH3588> I <WH589> am the LORD: <WH3068> because <WH3282> he hath said, <WH559> The river <WH2975> is mine, and I <WH589> have made <WH6213> it.

Behold, <WH2009> therefore <WH3651> I am against <WH413> thee, and against <WH413> thy rivers, <WH2975> and I will make <WH5414> <WH853> the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> utterly waste <WH2723> <WH2721> and desolate, <WH8077> from the tower <WH4480> <WH4024> of Syene <WH5482> even unto <WH5704> the border <WH1366> of Ethiopia. <WH3568>

No <WH3808> foot <WH7272> of man <WH120> shall pass <WH5674> through it, nor <WH3808> foot <WH7272> of beast <WH929> shall pass <WH5674> through it, neither <WH3808> shall it be inhabited <WH3427> forty <WH705> years. <WH8141>

And I will make <WH5414> <WH853> the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> desolate <WH8077> in the midst <WH8432> of the countries <WH776> that are desolate, <WH8074> and her cities <WH5892> among <WH8432> the cities <WH5892> that are laid waste <WH2717> shall be <WH1961> desolate <WH8077> forty <WH705> years: <WH8141> and I will scatter <WH6327> <WH853> the Egyptians <WH4714> among the nations, <WH1471> and will disperse <WH2219> them through the countries. <WH776>

Yet <WH3588> thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> At the end <WH4480> <WH7093> of forty <WH705> years <WH8141> will I gather <WH6908> <WH853> the Egyptians <WH4714> from <WH4480> the people <WH5971> whither <WH834> <WH8033> they were scattered: <WH6327>

And I will bring again <WH7725> <WH853> the captivity <WH7622> of Egypt, <WH4714> and will cause them to return <WH7725> into the land <WH776> of Pathros, <WH6624> into <WH5921> the land <WH776> of their habitation; <WH4351> and they shall be <WH1961> there <WH8033> a base <WH8217> kingdom. <WH4467>

It shall be <WH1961> the basest <WH8217> of <WH4480> the kingdoms; <WH4467> neither <WH3808> shall it exalt itself <WH5375> any more <WH5750> above <WH5921> the nations: <WH1471> for I will diminish <WH4591> them, that they shall no more <WH1115> rule <WH7287> over the nations. <WH1471>

And it shall be <WH1961> no <WH3808> more <WH5750> the confidence <WH4009> of the house <WH1004> of Israel, <WH3478> which bringeth their iniquity to remembrance, <WH2142> <WH5771> when they shall look <WH6437> after <WH310> them: but they shall know <WH3045> that <WH3588> I <WH589> am the Lord <WH136> GOD. <WH3069>

And it came to pass <WH1961> in the seven <WH7651> and twentieth <WH6242> year, <WH8141> in the first <WH7223> month, in the first <WH259> day of the month, <WH2320> the word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068> came <WH1961> unto <WH413> me, saying, <WH559>

Son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> Nebuchadnezzar <WH5019> king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894> caused <WH853> his army <WH2428> to serve <WH5647> a great <WH1419> service <WH5656> against <WH413> Tyrus: <WH6865> every <WH3605> head <WH7218> was made bald, <WH7139> and every <WH3605> shoulder <WH3802> was peeled: <WH4803> yet had <WH1961> he no <WH3808> wages, <WH7939> nor his army, <WH2428> for Tyrus, <WH4480> <WH6865> for <WH5921> the service <WH5656> that <WH834> he had served <WH5647> against <WH5921> it:

Therefore <WH3651> thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> Behold, <WH2009> I will give <WH5414> <WH853> the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> unto Nebuchadnezzar <WH5019> king <WH4428> of Babylon; <WH894> and he shall take <WH5375> her multitude, <WH1995> and take <WH7997> her spoil, <WH7998> and take <WH962> her prey; <WH957> and it shall be <WH1961> the wages <WH7939> for his army. <WH2428>

I have given <WH5414> him <WH853> the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> for his labor <WH6468> wherewith <WH834> he served <WH5647> against it, because <WH834> they wrought <WH6213> for me, saith <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> GOD. <WH3069>

In that <WH1931> day <WH3117> will I cause the horn <WH7161> of the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478> to bud forth, <WH6779> and I will give <WH5414> thee the opening <WH6610> of the mouth <WH6310> in the midst <WH8432> of them; and they shall know <WH3045> that <WH3588> I <WH589> am the LORD. <WH3068>
